document_data.name: ''Forester's Brush Hook''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''forester's brush hook''''' was a magical [[brush hook]] found in [[Uthe Lodge]] during the mid-1480s [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.Description: The brush hook had a long, straight handle and a hooked blade, similar to a [[kama]].
document_data.Powers: Despite being a fairly mundane tool, the ''forester's brush hook'' was enchanted to adaptively change its material and even [[alignment]] in order to bypass defenses and target weaknesses. For example, this allowed it to become [[silver]] to a [[werewolf]], or [[cold iron]] to a [[fey]], or adopt [[good]] alignment against a [[demon]]. On top of that, it was simply extremely sharp and deadly.
document_data.History: The blade was recovered from [[Uthe Lodge]], home of the [[ranger]] [[Peron Uthe]] after he was turned into a [[red musk zombie]] by [[Halsaime]].
